It is beautifully decorated in traditional Arabic style, featuring hand-made woodcraft and furnishings and fittings throughout the property.

All air-conditioned rooms and suites have sea views from private balconies, satellite TV, private toilet, and a fridge.

Guests can enjoy riding camels, horses, beach buggies, and bicycles. Alternatively, there are short trips, safari and water sports at the nearby beach.

 All rooms have a simple furnishing and a colorful décor with private bathroom, shower and A/C.

Eldorado features a traditional Italian restaurant with a wood-burning pizza oven, fresh handmade pasta and many other Italian delicacies. Authentic cappuccino, espresso and fresh juices are served at the bar.

Various trips including desert safaris, camel rides, and quad biking can be arranged on request. Bike rentals are also available just outside the Lodge.

Featuring rooms with views of the Red Sea or the garden, Dive Urge is situated right next to the Red Sea Dive Site. It offers diving facilities at an added charge. All accommodation at Dive Urge is air-conditioned and simply decorated. Each room is fitted with an en-suite toilet/shower room.

A shuttle to Sharm El Sheikh International Airport can be arranged for an extra fee. Massage services are available for a fee.

The hotel is just 8 km from Dahab city centre and a 70-minute drive from Sharm El-Sheikh International Airport.

This magnificent Hotel is only a 5-minute walk away from the world-renowned diving spot, The Blue Hole. The property rests in between the beautiful shoreline of the Red Sea and the grand mountains of Sinai, offering an unparalleled atmosphere and a serene view.

Suites and studios at 4S Hotel Dahab include modern furnishings and a balcony that overlooks the mountains, the sea or the swimming pool. They come equipped with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

In the morning the hotel serves a buffet breakfast on the sun terrace. There is also a bar, and a rooftop restaurant that features traditional cuisine and Bedouin seating.The rooftop cafe serves cocktails and refreshing tea and coffee.

Guests can enjoy a relaxing massage, or rent a bicycle and explore the countryside. Staff at the 24-hour front desk provide luggage storage and can arrange safari and snorkelling trips.

They offer a quiet, clean place to base yourself, near the main town of Dahab. Suitable for a family of 4 or for 4 friends, wishing to share.There is free WiFi available.

You are welcome to use the beach and facilities of Dive Urge, a PADI dive club, which is 2 minutes’ walk away.
